Footer.tagline: Transforming ambitious ideas into digital reality through cutting-edge engineering and design excellence.

Chatbot.welcome: Welcome to HeliosTech. How can I assist with your web apps or cloud deployments today?
Chatbot.pricingReply: Our pricing starts at $1,499 for landing pages. Enterprise products are custom quoted. You can view full details in our pricing section above.
Chatbot.aiReply: We specialize in integrating secure, private LLMs and predictive datasets into existing platforms to automate workflows.
Chatbot.webReply: HeliosTech designs and develops websites from landing pages to complex SaaS systems with modern frameworks like Next.js, React and Node.js.
Chatbot.mobileReply: We develop high-performance iOS & Android mobile apps using React Native and Flutter, with full backend and cloud integration.
Chatbot.defaultReply: I'm passing this request to our engineering team. You can also fill out the contact form for a faster response.
